member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.Description.TaskOperationAttribute
member.summary: Add this attribute to a service operation to indicate that this operation is a -based operation. In addition, add the attribute to a service class to enable -based service operations.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Description.TaskOperationAttribute.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)
member.summary: Passes data at runtime to bindings to support custom behavior.
member.remarks: This implementation does not pass any data.
member.param: The operation being examined. Use for examination only. If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.
The collection of objects that binding elements require to support the behavior.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Description.TaskOperationAttribute.ApplyClientBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation)
member.summary: Modifies a client across an operation.
member.remarks: This implementation does not affect any client operations.
member.param: The operation being examined. Use for examination only. If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.
The run-time object that exposes customization properties for the operation described by .

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Description.TaskOperationAttribute.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation)
member.summary: Enables support for invoking -based operations.
member.param: The operation being examined. Use for examination only. If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.
The run-time object that exposes customization properties for the operation described by .

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Description.TaskOperationAttribute.Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription)
member.summary: Implement to confirm that the operation meets some intended criteria.
member.remarks: This implementation does not validate any operations.
member.param: The operation being examined. Use for examination only. If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.

member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.Description.TaskServiceAttribute
member.summary: Add the attribute to a service class to enable -based service operations. In addition, use the on individual service operations to indicate that they are -based.
Passes custom data to binding elements to support the contract implementation.
member.remarks: This implementation does not pass any data.
member.param: The service description of the service.
The host of the service.
The service endpoints.
Custom objects to which binding elements have access.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Description.TaskServiceAttribute.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)
member.summary: Provides the ability to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter interceptors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects.
member.param: The service description.
The host that is currently being built.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Description.TaskServiceAttribute.Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)
member.summary: Provides the ability to inspect the service host and the service description to confirm that the service can run successfully.
member.remarks: This implementation does not do any validation.
member.param: The service description.
The service host that is currently being constructed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Http.FormUrlEncodedExtensions
member.summary: This class provides helper methods for decoding form url-encoded strings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Http.FormUrlEncodedExtensions.GetQueryStringAsJsonObject(System.ServiceModel.Web.IncomingWebRequestContext)
member.summary: Returns the query string from the incoming web context as a instance.
member.param: The instance where the query string can be retrieved.
member.returns: The query string parsed as a instance.
member.remarks: The main usage of this extension method is to retrieve the query string within an operation using the System.ServiceModel.Web.WebOperationContext.Current.IncomingContext object. The query string is parsed as x-www-form-urlencoded data.

member.summary: Parses a query string (x-www-form-urlencoded) as a .
member.param: The query string to be parsed.
member.returns: The corresponding to the given query string.

member.param: The query string to be parsed.
The maximum depth of object graph encoded as x-www-form-urlencoded.
member.returns: The corresponding to the given query string.

member.summary: Parses a collection of query string values as a .
member.param: The collection of query string values.
The maximum depth of object graph encoded as x-www-form-urlencoded.
member.returns: The corresponding to the given query string values.
